summary: Veteran A reported receiving Veteran B's protected health information (PHI) in an envelope along with Veteran A's PHI at Veteran A's home address. Veteran A dropped off the PHI of Veteran B to an employee. Veteran B's name, address, partial SSN and PHI were compromised.  This is informational for Mis-Mailed incidents and is the representative ticket. There were a total of 159 Mis-Mailed incidents this reporting period. Because of repetition, the other 158 are not included in this report, but are included in the "Mis-Mailed Incidents" count at the end of this report. In all incidents, Veterans will receive a notification letter and/or credit monitoring will be offered, if appropriate.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
